entry.title: Initial Commit
entry.content:
Hello and welcome to the Mostfit Nerdery blog. Here we will talk about all the problems you’re likely to face while building the world’s most lovingly crafted MIS for Microfinance. We will also be discussing all the half-baked and hot new features we’re working on and also embarrassing oursleves spectacularly when we fail to deliver on time and under budget.

Do stick us in your feed reader and check back often to see how we’re doing.

cheers svs
